title: 1951 Cupa României
text:
The 1951 <a href="Cupa%20Rom%C3%A2niei">Cupa României</a> is the 14th edition of <a href="Romania">Romania</a>'s most prestigious <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Single-elimination%20tournament">cup competition</a>.
The title was won by <a href="FC%20Steaua%20Bucure%C8%99ti">CCA București</a> against <a href="CS%20Gaz%20Metan%20Media%C8%99">Flacăra Mediaş</a>.
Format.
The competition is an annual <a href="Single-elimination%20tournament">knockout</a> tournament.
In the first round proper, two pots were made, first pot with <a href="Divizia%20A">Divizia A</a> teams and other teams till 16 and the second pot with the rest of teams qualified in this phase. First pot teams will play <a href="Road%20%28sports%29">away</a>. Each tie is played as a single leg.
If a match is drawn after 90 minutes, the game goes in <a href="Overtime%20%28sports%29">extra time</a>, and if the scored is still tight after 120 minutes, the team who plays <a href="Road%20%28sports%29">away</a> will qualify.
In case the teams are from same city, there a <a href="Replay%20%28sports%29">replay</a> will be played.
In case the teams play in the final, there a <a href="Replay%20%28sports%29">replay</a> will be played.
From the first edition, the teams from <a href="Divizia%20A">Divizia A</a> entered in competition in sixteen finals, rule which remained till today.
